title: Dragon Resurrection
description: Dragons are real. Or at least they were. Discovering the remains of an actual dragon frozen in the mountains of Tibet, Chinese adventurer Jesse Chang sends a DNA sample to her geneticist twin brother Jack, who sets to work unlocking its potential to improve the human genome. But when a rogue American general learns of the discovery and kidnaps Jack, Jesse is forced to use the untested formula on herself, unleashing the ancient powers of the dragon. The twins must face a squadron of mutated soldiers to stop abuse of the dragon DNA and save themselves, in this thrilling epic from China's DeZerlin Media!
author: Mark Byers
